title: Art Arranger Web App
description-short: Node/ExpressJS app that allows users to arrange public art onto a virtual wall, as well as share and rank different virtual walls.

title: VAE MIDI Training and Music Generation
description-short: I created a VAE that trains on visualized MIDI files to generate new music.

title: QuickReads Frontend
description-short: I worked with six developers to create an app that provides a feed of AI-summarized news stories. I was in charge of the frontend.

title: Coat of Arms Vector Art
description-short: I was commissioned by my local church to make vector art for T-Shirts for their summer camp.
